name: Retrospect (SeniorBeanGames)
description:
Do you like arcade games? well if so this game is for you!

you play as a green triangle and you have to fight those little red cubes (don't underestimate they when they gang together they are hard to fight!) there are 3 difficulty's each one has a different score multiplier. Easy mode x1, Medium x2, and Hard x3. so what are you waiting for? go play and challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score!!!

HOW TO PLAY:

move with the arrow keys or wasd, shoot by holding down left click and aim with your mouse. the player faces the mouse.
